1.title: Add collections of words
1.subtitle: Add words for learning and further training

2.title: Fill in your words
2.subtitle: Group the words into sets for ease of use

3.title: Use transcription
3.subtitle: Transcription is disabled by default, but you can enable it in the settings

4.title: Practice
4.subtitle: Choose sets of words to practice and repeat while playing!

Results.99: Excellent! You did a great job. Keep up the good work!
Results.90: Great! You have demonstrated an excellent result!
Results.80: Wonderful! You're clearly making progress. Keep it up !
Results.70: Decent! There are some things that can be improved, but you're on the right track.
Results.60: Good result! Your efforts are visible, and they bear fruit. Keep up the good work!
Results.50: Not bad! You're making progress, but there's still room for improvement. Keep practicing!
Results.49: It can be even better. Don't stop, and you will achieve more.

Messages.CollectionHasBennRemoved: The collection of words was successfully deleted
Messages.WordHasBeenAdded: A new word has been successfully added to the dictionary
Messages.CollectionHasBeenUpdated: The collection of words has been successfully changed
Messages.WordHasBeenUpdated: The word has been successfully changed

Errors.CollectionDetailErrorGetWords: Failed to load words from a set of words. Try again.

addWords.title: How do I add words?
addWords.step1: You need to create a set of words
addWords.step2: Fill in the word and press "Enter"

removeWord.title: How do I delete a word?
removeWord.step1: On the typing page, turn on edit mode and click on the delete word icon

selectWordsForTraining.title: How do I choose sets of words for training?
selectWordsForTraining.step1: Click "train" on the home screen or on the word set page
selectWordsForTraining.step2: Click on the list of collections

howToDeleteCollection.title: How do I delete a collection of words?
howToDeleteCollection.step1: On the set page, turn on edit mode and click on the "Edit" button
howToDeleteCollection.step2: Then click "Delete" and confirm the deletion

howToChangeLanguage.title: How do I change the language?
howToChangeLanguage.step2: Click on the language flag icon and select a different value

howToShare.title: How do I share a set of words?
howToShare.step1: Go to the word set page and click on the "share" icon

howToRemoveAd.title: How do I remove ads in the app?
howToRemoveAd.step1:: For more information, see the "Subscription" section

subscription.iosError:
Unfortunately, you can't make purchases on iOS devices in the VK app.
A subscription purchased on PC or Android will be active on iOS, so you can purchase it through the Web version of the Vkontakte website!)
subscription.buySubtitle: By purchasing a subscription, you help the development of the application :)
subscription.buyTitle: The subscription hides all ads in the app.

share.youCanShare: You can share a set of words
share.closePermissions: Close access to a set of words

share.linkCopiedError: The link could not be copied
